title: Pixel 3 Android 10 problems
content: I updated Android 10 on my Pixel 3 yesterday. It had some problems while updating, So, I did factory reset and updated again. It is now okay. But when I power off and on (or) restart my phone, it showed fastboot mode and to make factory reset. I did factory reset and it is reopen. So, I try to restart again. But it canâ€™t. It show fastboot mode again. I did factory reset 3 times today. How to fix it?
